About Zach

Hello, and welcome to my personal website. This is the very beginning of this site so it is fairly small. Within this site, you will find information about my areas of study, some information about myself that you might find interesting, and my work experience. I hope that this website is informative and helpful. In this website you will notice a couple of features for better information access:

  • Clickable nav links that smooth scroll to page sections
  • A resumé link to see my work history and contact information.
  • Bootstrap's scrollspy feature which highlights which section of the page you're on in the navbar
  • Gallery images which enlarge on click.

I am currently a super senior at Bradley University where I am hoping to graduate with a major in Theatre Performance and a minor in Computer Science. I first came to Bradley with my minor instead being a major in Electrical Engineering. I moved to Central Illinois from Kansas City back in the 4th grade. After I finish and graduate Bradley here in the Spring of 2022, I plan to move to Chicago and start networking as an actor, while using my CS minor to pick up work every now and then.

My History in Theatre Arts

I have been acting for almost as long as I can remember. All the way back in grade-school I can remember going onto the stage and falling in love with the theatre. I carried this passion for acting all the way through middle and high-school, up to college where I decided to make Performing Arts my major. I have performed for my high-school theatre, Bradley University, and my community theatre company: ArcLight Productions.

Below is a small selection of photos of me from different shows from both ArcLight and Bradley University. These are also some of my favorites!!
